game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, a young orphan named Eira discovers she is the last living heir of a ancient bloodline.
game.ending: With the help of her newfound allies, Eira defeats the dark sorcerer and restores magic to the world, becoming the legendary savior of her time.
game.synopsis: In a land ravaged by darkness, Eira embarks on a perilous journey to uncover the secrets of her past and reclaim the lost art of magic. Along the way, she must confront treacherous foes, forge unlikely alliances, and master the arcane arts in order to defeat an evil sorcerer threatening to destroy all that remains.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
